nchack.NCData.mask_lonlat¶

NCData.mask_lonlat(self, lon=[-180, 180], lat=[-90, 90], cores=1)¶

Mask a lon/lat box

Parameters

  • lon (list) -- Longitude range to mask. Must be of the form: [lon_min, lon_max]

  • lat (list) -- Latitude range to mask. Must be of the form: [lat_min, lat_max]

  • cores (int) -- Number of cores to use if files are processed in parallel. Defaults to non-parallel operation

Returns

Reduced tracker with masked data

Return type

nchack.NCData
